spec_data.Name: python3-django-notification
spec_data.Description:
Many sites need to notify users when certain events have occurred and to
allow configurable options as to how those notifications are to be received.

The project aims to provide a Django app for this sort of functionality.
This includes:

    * submission of notification messages by other apps
    * notification messages on signing in
    * notification messages via email (configurable by user)
    * notification messages via feed
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:35:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: User notification management for the Django web framework
